tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_profiles (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  occupation VARCHAR(100),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  interests TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_profiles (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE personas (
    persona_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    description TEXT,
    interests TEXT,
    behavior TEXT,
    customer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer_profiles(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
  purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  date DATE,
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE demographics (
  customer_id INT,
  income DECIMAL(10,2),
  education VARCHAR(50),
  occupation VARCHAR(50),
  marital_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name STRING,
    last_name STRING,
    email STRING,
    address STRING
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    purchase_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE age_groups (
    age_group_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    age INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE interests (
    interest_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    interest_name STRING
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    purchase_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE demographics (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    income DECIMAL(10, 2),
    occupation VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE interests (
    customer_id INT,
    interest VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE personas (
    persona_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    persona_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)
